data.message: Ashamed to call myself an Eminem fan. Scratch that...former fan. Your are now just another Hollywood Liberal...and a sell out. Go back to your mansion and cry me a river. You have done nothing but make rap albums. You haven't fought for this nation, your not a brain surgeon, a high school teacher, a non-profit founder, a nurse, a pastor etc. You have done nothing important with your riches and power. You have completely forgotten where you came from. If you want to voice your opinion knock yourself out but I will no longer be paying to hear it. Go ahead write a song and slam your former fans for calling you out on this political stunt... I'm not afraid of you or your gang of thugs.

replies.message: I don't know how to do one of them GIF things but if I did, it probably wouldn't be appropriate.   Urinate on him!
That awkward moment when he cooked  tf out  of Hillary.
